release dates: USA::27 February 2013                            (New York City, New York)
imdb.plot outline: This is a talk show with patients who have been in pain and now due to regenerative medicine are either recovering or out of pain. The show will touch on the sensitive subjects of stem cell research and regenerative medicine by Dr. Farshchian who is a bit of a celebrity in the field of regenerative medicine. Viewers can expect the show to be respectful toward the guest patients, informative as his previous shows have been and helpful in determining how to overcome their own physical ailments.
imdb.title: The Medicine Man
plot: Introduction of the Hosts Introduction of the Patients Review of Patients History and Previous Treatments Discussion on Patients Feelings Show Closing::Anonymous

This is a talk show with patients who have been in pain and now due to regenerative medicine are either recovering or out of pain. The show will touch on the sensitive subjects of stem cell research and regenerative medicine by Dr. Farshchian who is a bit of a celebrity in the field of regenerative medicine. Viewers can expect the show to be respectful toward the guest patients, informative as his previous shows have been and helpful in determining how to overcome their own physical ailments.::Anonymous
